laboratory_examinations.findings: No abnormalities for rheumatoid factor, antinuclear, anti-dsDNA, anti-SSA/SSB, and antiphospholipid antibodies.
Within normal range; IgG index was 0.46 with absent oligoclonal bands.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: A second CSF study revealed mild lymphocytosis (17/mm3).

laboratory_examinations.findings: Multiple intense F-18 FDG accumulations in mediastinal and abdominal lymph nodes; maximum standardized uptake value of lymph nodes ranged from 4 g/mL to 13 g/mL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up F-18 FDG PET/CT showed no abnormal accumulation, indicating no evidence of active sarcoidosis.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Faint to mild F-18 FLT accumulations observed; uptake was much lower than that of F-18 FDG.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up F-18 FLT PET/CT showed no abnormal accumulation, aligning with the absence of disease activity.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Multiple small centrilobular pulmonary nodules along the peribronchovascular bundle and subpleural area.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No disease activity on follow-up chest CT.
